channel.title: WORST SERVER PROBLEM EVER? - Read = Must XD | Answer = Pleased about it
channel.description:
;D[IMG]http://i752.photobucket.com/albums/xx164/vassilistein/Heythere.jpg[/img];D
My neighbour knows everything about computers and windows, even about java programming! We tried to publish my server on no-ip, but my Easy-Box does not work for no-ip so we registered it on dyndns. That works. I use Pk Planet Client and Source downloaded and Guide here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,433417.msg3182266.html#msg3182266
Well, I changed Ip from 127.0.0.1 on Gui.java to myipadress(ImNotAllowedToTell).dyndns.org, and I try to log in on my server on any Ip switcher like moparscape or something. Heres another Client where u can type ur Ip u want in:
[IMG]http://i752.photobucket.com/albums/xx164/vassilistein/Connecting.jpg[/img]
Well, its connecting me and I see this for like 2 seconds:
[IMG]http://i752.photobucket.com/albums/xx164/vassilistein/AlmostLOggedin.jpg[/img]
Then, after 2 or 3 seconds without any error like Connection lost, the window changes back to login. THAT HAPPENS ONLY IF I TRY TO LOG IN IN MY SERVER, OTHER IP'S ARE WORKING, AND I CAN LOGIN ON MY SERVER BY USING MY CLIENT IN MY FOLDER!:
Thats what I see after 2 seconds :
[IMG]http://i752.photobucket.com/albums/xx164/vassilistein/loggedoffagain.jpg[/img]
I dont why I cant log in in my server on any client. I want it online so bad :(
BY THE WAY: I dont know why but my brother downloaded that sources and client on his computer too, he changed IP on gui.java too and for a few minutes we both were online in same server? I dont know how that happened but now it does not work anymore, however.
In summa: I want to know why i cant login by any ip switch server

item.title: WORST SERVER PROBLEM EVER? - Read = Must XD | Answer = Pleased about it
item.dc:creator: @Saletana Saletana
item.description:
@Saletana wrote:

                                                          ;D[IMG]http://i752.photobucket.com/albums/xx164/vassilistein/Heythere.jpg[/img];D

My neighbour knows everything about computers and windows, even about java programming!
We tried to publish my server on no-ip, but my Easy-Box does not work for no-ip so we registered it on dyndns. That works.
I use Pk Planet Client and Source downloaded and Guide here:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Well, I changed Ip from 127.0.0.1 on Gui.java
to myipadress(ImNotAllowedToTell).dyndns.org, and I try to log in on my server on any Ip switcher like moparscape or something.
Heres another Client where u can type ur Ip u want in:

Connecting.jpg1009×611

Well, its connecting me and I see this for like 2 seconds:

AlmostLOggedin.jpg1004×609

Then, after 2 or 3 seconds without any error like Connection lost, the window changes back to login. THAT HAPPENS ONLY IF I TRY TO LOG IN IN MY SERVER, OTHER IP’S ARE WORKING, AND I CAN LOGIN ON MY SERVER BY USING MY CLIENT IN MY FOLDER!:

Thats what I see after 2 seconds :

loggedoffagain.jpg969×602

I dont why I cant log in in my server on any client. I want it online so bad

BY THE WAY:
I dont know why but my brother downloaded that sources and client on his computer too, he changed IP on gui.java too and for a few minutes we both were online in same server? I dont know how that happened but now it does not work anymore, however.

In summa: I want to know why i cant login by any ip switch server
